name: Lynx Survival Simulator
description:
Come play the game that takes you on an epic journey into the world of the Lynx. Now you get the chance to see how this small and ferocious cat behaves in the wild. The goal is to rescue all 4 members of your Lynx family. They are being held captive by the giant bosses. Your second task is to defeat all the giant bosses. Start this ultimate game of survival now!
Top Game Features:
--Defeat all 5 big boss characters - Giant Deer, Bat, Bear, Crocodile, and Horse
--Find all 4 members of your Lynx family
 --Upgrade your wild cat's Strength, Stamina, and Speed
 --10 Different Forest Animals included
 --Alternating weather patterns including rain and snow plus 4 Different Times of Day
--Massive Open World 3D Map with detailed graphics 
--Survival is the name of the game

We have created a huge open world game with many lots to explore, loads of animals, and plenty of challenges. Find the Crocodile Den, the Bear Cave, the Horse Sanctuary, and the Bat Cave. All the features you would expect to see in a top quality 3D animal simulator. Thrive and survive as you take on all the challenges of a huge forest map. Animals include bear, wolf, dog, deer, bat, horse, duck, and croc So,come and play the latest game in the Wildfoot series of Super Simulators.

HINT : Use the call button to the other cats. Your family members will help you defeat the big bosses. Its a really cool feature. The more you hunt, the more meat points you earn.

This animal simulator has been designed with all ages in mind.

Please Like us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/wildfootgames Please check out our other 3D animal sims -We realize the app is not perfect, and we welcome your constructive criticism. Please send your suggestions to wildfootgames@gmail.com. At Wild Foot we are looking for things we can do to improve the app. Enjoy!
